summary: Clickable button supporting sizes, variants and accessible labels.

recommendations.reason: Use ButtonGroup to group multiple buttons together for better layout and accessibility.
Use IconButton for buttons that only contain an icon, providing a more compact and visually distinct option.
Use Link for navigation purposes instead of Button, which is meant for actions.

Primary buttons are best for important actions, while secondary buttons are suitable for less critical actions. There should typically be only one primary button per screen/section to avoid confusion.
Use disabled state to indicate that a button is not currently actionable.
